ALLMunicipalityInspections.name: ALLMunicipalityInspections
ALLMunicipalityInspections.queryString:
select MI.inspectionGuid as inspectionGuid,
MI.assignedTo as assignedTo,
MI.DateAssigned as dateAssigned,
assignedUser.fullName as assignedToPersonName,
IO.outcome as outcome,
MI.inspectionTitle as inspectionTitle,
gis.inspectionZone as inspectionZone,
MI.requestedFor as requestedFor,
gis.fullAddress as fullAddress,
gis.lot as lot,
gis.subdivision as subdivision,
requestedBy.fullName as requestedByFullName,
ID.inspectDesignName as inspectDesignName,
MI.DateCreated as dateCreated
from MasterInspections as MI
LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY GF.RelatedFormGUID ORDER BY GF.AddedTime) AS rn,
				GF.RelatedFormGuid as formGuid,
				GR.Lot,
				SD.Subdivision,
				GR.InspectionZone,
				GR.FullAddress
				FROM GIS2Forms GF, GisRecords GR, Subdivisions SD
				WHERE GR.ID=GF.GISRecordId AND SD.ID=GR.SubdivisionId
) AS gis ON gis.FormGuid=MI.FormGUID AND gis.rn=1
LEFT OUTER JOIN Users assignedUser on assignedUser.id=MI.assignedTo
LEFT OUTER JOIN Users requestedBy on requestedBy.id=MI.requestedBy
LEFT OUTER JOIN InspectionDesign ID on ID.ID=MI.InspectionDesignId
LEFT OUTER JOIN InspectionOutcome IO ON IO.ID=MI.InspectionOutcomeId
where (:municipality IS NULL OR ID.municipalityId=:municipality) and (:startDate is null or MI.DateCreated >= :startDate) and (:endDate is null or MI.DateCreated <= :endDate)
ALLMunicipalityInspections.countQueryString:
select count(*) from (select MI.inspectionGuid as inspectionGuid,
MI.assignedTo as assignedTo,
MI.DateAssigned as dateAssigned,
assignedUser.fullName as assignedToPersonName,
IO.outcome as outcome,
MI.inspectionTitle as inspectionTitle,
gis.inspectionZone as inspectionZone,
MI.requestedFor as requestedFor,
gis.fullAddress as fullAddress,
gis.lot as lot,
gis.subdivision as subdivision,
requestedBy.fullName as requestedByFullName,
ID.inspectDesignName as inspectDesignName,
MI.DateCreated as dateCreated
from MasterInspections as MI
LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY GF.RelatedFormGUID ORDER BY GF.AddedTime) AS rn,
				GF.RelatedFormGuid as formGuid,
				GR.Lot,
				SD.Subdivision,
				GR.InspectionZone,
				GR.FullAddress
				FROM GIS2Forms GF, GisRecords GR, Subdivisions SD
				WHERE GR.ID=GF.GISRecordId AND SD.ID=GR.SubdivisionId
) AS gis ON gis.FormGuid=MI.FormGUID AND gis.rn=1
LEFT OUTER JOIN Users assignedUser on assignedUser.id=MI.assignedTo
LEFT OUTER JOIN Users requestedBy on requestedBy.id=MI.requestedBy
LEFT OUTER JOIN InspectionDesign ID on ID.ID=MI.InspectionDesignId
LEFT OUTER JOIN InspectionOutcome IO ON IO.ID=MI.InspectionOutcomeId
where (:municipality IS NULL OR ID.municipalityId=:municipality) and (:startDate is null or MI.DateCreated >= :startDate) and (:endDate is null or MI.DateCreated <= :endDate)) wmTempTable

CasesByMunicipality.name: CasesByMunicipality
CasesByMunicipality.queryString:
SELECT MF.FormGuid as formGuid,
	MF.FormTitle as formTitle,
	MF.DateModified as dateModified,
	MU.MunicipalityName as municipalityName,
	U.FullName as createdBy,
	FT.FormType as formDesign,
	FS.Status as formStatus,
	GR.Lot as lot,
	GR.Subdivision as subdivision,
	GR.FullAddress as address,
	V.CompanyName as primaryVendor,
	MF.BalanceDue as balanceDue
FROM MasterForms MF
LEFT OUTER JOIN FormStatuses AS FS ON FS.ID=MF.FormStatusId
LEFT OUTER JOIN FormTypes AS FT ON FT.ID=MF.FormTypeId
LEFT OUTER JOIN Municipalities AS MU ON MU.ID=FT.MunicipalityId
LEFT JOIN Users AS U ON U.ID=MF.UserId
LEFT OUTER JOIN Vendor AS V ON V.ID=MF.CXVendorId
LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY GF.RelatedFormGUID ORDER BY GF.AddedTime) AS rn,
				GF.RelatedFormGuid as formGuid,
				GR.Lot,
				SD.Subdivision,
				GR.FullAddress
				FROM GIS2Forms GF, GisRecords GR, Subdivisions SD
				WHERE GR.ID=GF.GISRecordId AND SD.ID=GR.SubdivisionId
) AS GR ON GR.FormGuid=MF.FormGUID AND GR.rn=1
where  FT.CodeEnforcement=:codeEnforcement and 
    Closed=:closed and  (:municipalityId IS NULL OR FT.MunicipalityId=:municipalityId)
CasesByMunicipality.countQueryString:
select count(*) from (SELECT MF.FormGuid as formGuid,
	MF.FormTitle as formTitle,
	MF.DateModified as dateModified,
	MU.MunicipalityName as municipalityName,
	U.FullName as createdBy,
	FT.FormType as formDesign,
	FS.Status as formStatus,
	GR.Lot as lot,
	GR.Subdivision as subdivision,
	GR.FullAddress as address,
	V.CompanyName as primaryVendor,
	MF.BalanceDue as balanceDue
FROM MasterForms MF
LEFT OUTER JOIN FormStatuses AS FS ON FS.ID=MF.FormStatusId
LEFT OUTER JOIN FormTypes AS FT ON FT.ID=MF.FormTypeId
LEFT OUTER JOIN Municipalities AS MU ON MU.ID=FT.MunicipalityId
LEFT JOIN Users AS U ON U.ID=MF.UserId
LEFT OUTER JOIN Vendor AS V ON V.ID=MF.CXVendorId
LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY GF.RelatedFormGUID ORDER BY GF.AddedTime) AS rn,
				GF.RelatedFormGuid as formGuid,
				GR.Lot,
				SD.Subdivision,
				GR.FullAddress
				FROM GIS2Forms GF, GisRecords GR, Subdivisions SD
				WHERE GR.ID=GF.GISRecordId AND SD.ID=GR.SubdivisionId
) AS GR ON GR.FormGuid=MF.FormGUID AND GR.rn=1
where  FT.CodeEnforcement=:codeEnforcement and 
    Closed=:closed and  (:municipalityId IS NULL OR FT.MunicipalityId=:municipalityId)) wmTempTable

CompanyFormsByVendorId.name: CompanyFormsByVendorId
CompanyFormsByVendorId.queryString:
SELECT MF.FormGuid as formGuid,
	MF.FormTitle as formTitle,
	MF.DateSubmitted as dateSubmitted,
	MF.DateModified as dateModified,
	MU.MunicipalityName as municipalityName,
	U.FullName as createdBy,
	FT.FormType as formDesign,
	FS.Status as formStatus,
	GR.Lot as lot,
	GR.Subdivision as subdivision,
	GR.FullAddress as address,
	V.CompanyName as primaryVendor,
	MF.BalanceDue as balanceDue
FROM MasterForms MF
LEFT OUTER JOIN FormStatuses AS FS ON FS.ID=MF.FormStatusId
LEFT OUTER JOIN FormTypes AS FT ON FT.ID=MF.FormTypeId
LEFT OUTER JOIN Municipalities AS MU ON MU.ID=FT.MunicipalityId
LEFT JOIN Users AS U ON U.ID=MF.UserId
LEFT JOIN MunicipalityGroups AS MG ON MG.id=FS.processOwners
LEFT OUTER JOIN Vendor AS V ON V.ID=MF.CXVendorId
LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY GF.RelatedFormGUID ORDER BY GF.AddedTime) AS rn,
				GF.RelatedFormGuid as formGuid,
				GR.Lot,
				SD.Subdivision,
				GR.FullAddress

where
    Closed=:closed
	AND MF.FormGUID IN (select relatedFormGuid from Vendors2form where vendorId=:vendorId)

CountOfUserForms.name: CountOfUserForms
CountOfUserForms.description: To get count for open or closed for user and SharedWith user
CountOfUserForms.queryString:
SELECT count(MF.FormGuid) as formsCount

FROM MasterForms MF
LEFT OUTER JOIN FormStatuses AS FS ON FS.ID=MF.FormStatusId
LEFT OUTER JOIN FormTypes AS FT ON FT.ID=MF.FormTypeId
LEFT OUTER JOIN Municipalities AS MU ON MU.ID=FT.MunicipalityId
LEFT JOIN Users AS U ON U.ID=MF.UserId


where  (:codeEnforcement IS NULL OR FT.CodeEnforcement=:codeEnforcement) and 
    Closed=:closed and (UserId=:creatorUser or MF.FormGUID IN (select relatedGuid from SharedWith WHERE SharedWithUser = :sharedWithUser ))
    AND (:municipalityId IS NULL OR FT.MunicipalityId=:municipalityId)
CountOfUserForms.countQueryString:
select count(*) from (SELECT count(MF.FormGuid) as formsCount

FROM MasterForms MF
LEFT OUTER JOIN FormStatuses AS FS ON FS.ID=MF.FormStatusId
LEFT OUTER JOIN FormTypes AS FT ON FT.ID=MF.FormTypeId
LEFT OUTER JOIN Municipalities AS MU ON MU.ID=FT.MunicipalityId
LEFT JOIN Users AS U ON U.ID=MF.UserId


where  (:codeEnforcement IS NULL OR FT.CodeEnforcement=:codeEnforcement) and 
    Closed=:closed and (UserId=:creatorUser or MF.FormGUID IN (select relatedGuid from SharedWith WHERE SharedWithUser = :sharedWithUser ))
    AND (:municipalityId IS NULL OR FT.MunicipalityId=:municipalityId)) wmTempTable

FeesInCartByUser.name: FeesInCartByUser
FeesInCartByUser.queryString:
select MC.id as id,
       MF.FormTitle as itemTitle,
       MF.FormGuid as itemGuid,
       FT.formType as parentItemName,
       muni.MunicipalityName as municipalityName,
       'form' as itemType,
       (select top 1 gis.fullAddress from GISRecords gis, GIS2Forms gtf where gis.ID=gtf.GisRecordID and gtf.RelatedFormGUID=MF.FormGUID) as fullAddress,
       fees.feeType as feeType,
       fees.amount as amount
from MyCart MC
INNER JOIN Fees fees ON fees.id=MC.feeId
INNER JOIN MasterForms MF ON MF.FormGUID=fees.FormGuid
INNER JOIN FormTypes FT ON FT.ID=MF.FormTypeId
INNER JOIN Municipalities muni ON muni.ID=FT.MunicipalityID
where MC.userId=:user and fees.PaidStatus='Unpaid'
FeesInCartByUser.countQueryString:
select count(*) from (select MC.id as id,
       MF.FormTitle as itemTitle,
       MF.FormGuid as itemGuid,
       FT.formType as parentItemName,
       muni.MunicipalityName as municipalityName,
       'form' as itemType,
       (select top 1 gis.fullAddress from GISRecords gis, GIS2Forms gtf where gis.ID=gtf.GisRecordID and gtf.RelatedFormGUID=MF.FormGUID) as fullAddress,
       fees.feeType as feeType,
       fees.amount as amount
from MyCart MC
INNER JOIN Fees fees ON fees.id=MC.feeId
INNER JOIN MasterForms MF ON MF.FormGUID=fees.FormGuid
INNER JOIN FormTypes FT ON FT.ID=MF.FormTypeId
INNER JOIN Municipalities muni ON muni.ID=FT.MunicipalityID
where MC.userId=:user and fees.PaidStatus='Unpaid') wmTempTable

FeesOfMunicipality.name: FeesOfMunicipality
FeesOfMunicipality.queryString:
SELECT 
    FE.ID as feeId,
    FE.PaidDate as paidDate,
    FE.PaidStatus as paidStatus,
    FE.AccountingCode as accountingCode,
    PU.FullName as paidBy,
    FE.TransactionId as transactionId,
    FE.DateModified as dateModified,
    FE.FeeType as feeType,
    MF.FormGuid as formGuid,
	MF.FormTitle as formTitle,
	MU.MunicipalityName as municipalityName,
	U.FullName as createdBy,
	FT.FormType as formType,
	FS.Status as formStatus,
	GR.Lot as lot,
	FE.Comments as feeComments,
	GR.Subdivision as subdivision,
	GR.FullAddress as address,
	V.CompanyName as primaryVendor,
	FE.Amount as amount,
	PH.PaymentMethod as paymentMethod,
	PH.PaymentNumber as paymentNumber
FROM Fees FE
LEFT OUTER JOIN MasterForms AS MF  ON MF.FormGuid=FE.FormGuid
LEFT OUTER JOIN PaymentHistory AS PH  ON PH.TransactionId=FE.TransactionId
LEFT OUTER JOIN FormStatuses AS FS ON FS.ID=MF.FormStatusId
LEFT OUTER JOIN FormTypes AS FT ON FT.ID=MF.FormTypeId
LEFT OUTER JOIN Municipalities AS MU ON MU.ID=FT.MunicipalityId
LEFT JOIN Users AS U ON U.ID=MF.UserId
LEFT JOIN Users AS PU ON PU.ID=FE.PaidByUserId
LEFT OUTER JOIN Vendor AS V ON V.ID=MF.CXVendorId
LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY GF.RelatedFormGUID ORDER BY GF.AddedTime) AS rn,
				GF.RelatedFormGuid as formGuid,
				GR.Lot,
				SD.Subdivision,
				GR.FullAddress
				FROM GIS2Forms GF, GisRecords GR, Subdivisions SD
				WHERE GR.ID=GF.GISRecordId AND SD.ID=GR.SubdivisionId
) AS GR ON GR.FormGuid=MF.FormGUID AND GR.rn=1
where (:municipalityId IS NULL OR FE.MunicipalityId=:municipalityId) and (:paidStatus IS NULL OR FE.PaidStatus=:paidStatus) and FE.DateCreated BETWEEN :startDate and :endDate
FeesOfMunicipality.countQueryString:
select count(*) from (SELECT 
    FE.ID as feeId,
    FE.PaidDate as paidDate,
    FE.PaidStatus as paidStatus,
    FE.AccountingCode as accountingCode,
    PU.FullName as paidBy,
    FE.TransactionId as transactionId,
    FE.DateModified as dateModified,
    FE.FeeType as feeType,
    MF.FormGuid as formGuid,
	MF.FormTitle as formTitle,
	MU.MunicipalityName as municipalityName,
	U.FullName as createdBy,
	FT.FormType as formType,
	FS.Status as formStatus,
	GR.Lot as lot,
	FE.Comments as feeComments,
	GR.Subdivision as subdivision,
	GR.FullAddress as address,
	V.CompanyName as primaryVendor,
	FE.Amount as amount,
	PH.PaymentMethod as paymentMethod,
	PH.PaymentNumber as paymentNumber
FROM Fees FE
LEFT OUTER JOIN MasterForms AS MF  ON MF.FormGuid=FE.FormGuid
LEFT OUTER JOIN PaymentHistory AS PH  ON PH.TransactionId=FE.TransactionId
LEFT OUTER JOIN FormStatuses AS FS ON FS.ID=MF.FormStatusId
LEFT OUTER JOIN FormTypes AS FT ON FT.ID=MF.FormTypeId
LEFT OUTER JOIN Municipalities AS MU ON MU.ID=FT.MunicipalityId
LEFT JOIN Users AS U ON U.ID=MF.UserId
LEFT JOIN Users AS PU ON PU.ID=FE.PaidByUserId
LEFT OUTER JOIN Vendor AS V ON V.ID=MF.CXVendorId
LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY GF.RelatedFormGUID ORDER BY GF.AddedTime) AS rn,
				GF.RelatedFormGuid as formGuid,
				GR.Lot,
				SD.Subdivision,
				GR.FullAddress
				FROM GIS2Forms GF, GisRecords GR, Subdivisions SD
				WHERE GR.ID=GF.GISRecordId AND SD.ID=GR.SubdivisionId
) AS GR ON GR.FormGuid=MF.FormGUID AND GR.rn=1
where (:municipalityId IS NULL OR FE.MunicipalityId=:municipalityId) and (:paidStatus IS NULL OR FE.PaidStatus=:paidStatus) and FE.DateCreated BETWEEN :startDate and :endDate) wmTempTable

FormFeesForUsersAndShared.queryString:
SELECT 
    FE.ID as feeId,
    FE.FeeType as feeType,
    MF.FormGuid as formGuid,
	MF.DateModified as dateModified,
	MF.FormTitle as formTitle,
	MU.MunicipalityName as municipalityName,
	U.FullName as createdBy,
	FT.FormType as formType,
	FS.Status as formStatus,
	GR.Lot as lot,
	GR.Subdivision as subdivision,
	GR.FullAddress as address,
	V.CompanyName as primaryVendor,
	FE.Amount as balanceDue
FROM Fees FE
LEFT OUTER JOIN MasterForms AS MF  ON MF.FormGuid=FE.FormGuid and FE.ID NOT IN (select FeeID from MyCart where UserId=:creatorUser)
LEFT OUTER JOIN FormStatuses AS FS ON FS.ID=MF.FormStatusId
LEFT OUTER JOIN FormTypes AS FT ON FT.ID=MF.FormTypeId
LEFT OUTER JOIN Municipalities AS MU ON MU.ID=FT.MunicipalityId
LEFT JOIN Users AS U ON U.ID=MF.UserId
LEFT OUTER JOIN Vendor AS V ON V.ID=MF.CXVendorId
LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY GF.RelatedFormGUID ORDER BY GF.AddedTime) AS rn,
				GF.RelatedFormGuid as formGuid,
				GR.Lot,
				SD.Subdivision,
				GR.FullAddress
				FROM GIS2Forms GF, GisRecords GR, Subdivisions SD
				WHERE GR.ID=GF.GISRecordId AND SD.ID=GR.SubdivisionId
) AS GR ON GR.FormGuid=MF.FormGUID AND GR.rn=1
where FS.AllowPayment=:allowPayment and FE.PaidStatus=:paidStatus and (UserId=:creatorUser or MF.FormGUID IN (select relatedGuid from SharedWith WHERE SharedWithUser = :sharedWithUser))

LEFT OUTER JOIN FormTypes AS FT ON FT.ID=MF.FormTypeId
LEFT OUTER JOIN Municipalities AS MU ON MU.ID=FT.MunicipalityId
LEFT JOIN Users AS U ON U.ID=MF.UserId
LEFT OUTER JOIN Vendor AS V ON V.ID=MF.CXVendorId

				GF.RelatedFormGuid as formGuid,
				GR.Lot,
				SD.Subdivision,
				GR.FullAddress
				FROM GIS2Forms GF, GisRecords GR, Subdivisions SD
				WHERE GR.ID=GF.GISRecordId AND SD.ID=GR.SubdivisionId

FormsByCategoryForDashBoard.name: FormsByCategoryForDashBoard
FormsByCategoryForDashBoard.queryString:
select count(MF.FormGUID) as counts,FC.Category
--MF.FormTypeId,MF.FormGUID,FT.ID,FT.FormType,FC.ID,FC.Category
from cx2.MasterForms MF 
inner join cx2.FormTypes FT
on  MF.FormTypeId=FT.ID
inner join  cx2.FormCategoryMapping FCM
on FCM.FormTypeId=FT.ID
inner join cx2.FormCategories FC
on FC.ID=FCM.FormCategoryId

where MF.MunicipalityId=:municipality and MF.DateSubmitted BETWEEN :startDate and :endDate
group by FC.Category
FormsByCategoryForDashBoard.countQueryString:
select count(*) from (select count(MF.FormGUID) as counts,FC.Category
--MF.FormTypeId,MF.FormGUID,FT.ID,FT.FormType,FC.ID,FC.Category
from cx2.MasterForms MF 
inner join cx2.FormTypes FT
on  MF.FormTypeId=FT.ID
inner join  cx2.FormCategoryMapping FCM
on FCM.FormTypeId=FT.ID
inner join cx2.FormCategories FC
on FC.ID=FCM.FormCategoryId

where MF.MunicipalityId=:municipality and MF.DateSubmitted BETWEEN :startDate and :endDate
group by FC.Category) wmTempTable

FormsForUsersAndShared.name: FormsForUsersAndShared
FormsForUsersAndShared.description: Brings closed or opened  Forms of creator and shared with user
FormsForUsersAndShared.queryString:
SELECT MF.FormGuid as formGuid,
    MF.DateSubmitted as dateSubmitted,
	DateModified as dateModified,
	MF.FormTitle as formTitle,
	MU.MunicipalityName as municipalityName,
	U.FullName as createdBy,
	FT.FormType as formDesign,
	FS.Status as formStatus,
	GR.Lot as lot,
	GR.Subdivision as subdivision,
	GR.FullAddress as address,
	V.CompanyName as primaryVendor,
	MF.BalanceDue as balanceDue
FROM MasterForms MF
LEFT OUTER JOIN FormStatuses AS FS ON FS.ID=MF.FormStatusId
LEFT OUTER JOIN FormTypes AS FT ON FT.ID=MF.FormTypeId
LEFT OUTER JOIN Municipalities AS MU ON MU.ID=FT.MunicipalityId
LEFT JOIN Users AS U ON U.ID=MF.UserId
LEFT OUTER JOIN Vendor AS V ON V.ID=MF.CXVendorId
LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY GF.RelatedFormGUID ORDER BY GF.AddedTime) AS rn,
				GF.RelatedFormGuid as formGuid,
				GR.Lot,
				SD.Subdivision,
				GR.FullAddress
				FROM GIS2Forms GF, GisRecords GR, Subdivisions SD
				WHERE GR.ID=GF.GISRecordId AND SD.ID=GR.SubdivisionId
) AS GR ON GR.FormGuid=MF.FormGUID AND GR.rn=1
where (:codeEnforcement IS NULL OR FT.CodeEnforcement=:codeEnforcement) and 
    Closed=:closed and (UserId=:creatorUser or MF.FormGUID IN (select relatedGuid from SharedWith WHERE SharedWithUser = :sharedWithUser ))
    AND (:municipalityId IS NULL OR FT.MunicipalityId=:municipalityId)
FormsForUsersAndShared.countQueryString:
select count(*) from (SELECT MF.FormGuid as formGuid,
    MF.DateSubmitted as dateSubmitted,
	DateModified as dateModified,
	MF.FormTitle as formTitle,
	MU.MunicipalityName as municipalityName,
	U.FullName as createdBy,
	FT.FormType as formDesign,
	FS.Status as formStatus,
	GR.Lot as lot,
	GR.Subdivision as subdivision,
	GR.FullAddress as address,
	V.CompanyName as primaryVendor,
	MF.BalanceDue as balanceDue
FROM MasterForms MF
LEFT OUTER JOIN FormStatuses AS FS ON FS.ID=MF.FormStatusId
LEFT OUTER JOIN FormTypes AS FT ON FT.ID=MF.FormTypeId
LEFT OUTER JOIN Municipalities AS MU ON MU.ID=FT.MunicipalityId
LEFT JOIN Users AS U ON U.ID=MF.UserId
LEFT OUTER JOIN Vendor AS V ON V.ID=MF.CXVendorId
LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY GF.RelatedFormGUID ORDER BY GF.AddedTime) AS rn,
				GF.RelatedFormGuid as formGuid,
				GR.Lot,
				SD.Subdivision,
				GR.FullAddress
				FROM GIS2Forms GF, GisRecords GR, Subdivisions SD
				WHERE GR.ID=GF.GISRecordId AND SD.ID=GR.SubdivisionId
) AS GR ON GR.FormGuid=MF.FormGUID AND GR.rn=1
where (:codeEnforcement IS NULL OR FT.CodeEnforcement=:codeEnforcement) and 
    Closed=:closed and (UserId=:creatorUser or MF.FormGUID IN (select relatedGuid from SharedWith WHERE SharedWithUser = :sharedWithUser ))
    AND (:municipalityId IS NULL OR FT.MunicipalityId=:municipalityId)) wmTempTable

FormsTaggedWithGISRecords.name: FormsTaggedWithGISRecords
FormsTaggedWithGISRecords.queryString:
SELECT MF.FormGuid as formGuid,MF.FormTitle as formTitle,MU.MunicipalityName as municipalityName,U.FullName as createdBy,FT.FormType as formDesign,FS.Status as formStatus, MF.DateModified as dateModified,
	GR.Lot as lot,GR.Subdivision as subdivision,GR.FullAddress as address,V.CompanyName as primaryVendor,MF.BalanceDue as balanceDue
	,FT.ID as formTypeID
FROM MasterForms MF
LEFT OUTER JOIN FormStatuses AS FS ON FS.ID=MF.FormStatusId
LEFT OUTER JOIN FormTypes AS FT ON FT.ID=MF.FormTypeId
LEFT OUTER JOIN Municipalities AS MU ON MU.ID=FT.MunicipalityId
LEFT JOIN Users AS U ON U.ID=MF.UserId
LEFT OUTER JOIN Vendor AS V ON V.ID=MF.CXVendorId
LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY GF.RelatedFormGUID ORDER BY GF.AddedTime) AS rn,
				GF.RelatedFormGuid as formGuid,GR.Lot,SD.Subdivision,GR.FullAddress
				FROM GIS2Forms GF, GisRecords GR, Subdivisions SD
				WHERE GR.ID=GF.GISRecordId AND SD.ID=GR.SubdivisionId
) AS GR ON GR.FormGuid=MF.FormGUID AND GR.rn=1
where   FT.CodeEnforcement=:codeEnforcement 
     and (MF.FormGUID IN (select RelatedFormGUID from GIS2Forms where GISRecordId=:GISRecordId ))
FormsTaggedWithGISRecords.countQueryString:
select count(*) from (SELECT MF.FormGuid as formGuid,MF.FormTitle as formTitle,MU.MunicipalityName as municipalityName,U.FullName as createdBy,FT.FormType as formDesign,FS.Status as formStatus, MF.DateModified as dateModified,
	GR.Lot as lot,GR.Subdivision as subdivision,GR.FullAddress as address,V.CompanyName as primaryVendor,MF.BalanceDue as balanceDue
	,FT.ID as formTypeID
FROM MasterForms MF
LEFT OUTER JOIN FormStatuses AS FS ON FS.ID=MF.FormStatusId
LEFT OUTER JOIN FormTypes AS FT ON FT.ID=MF.FormTypeId
LEFT OUTER JOIN Municipalities AS MU ON MU.ID=FT.MunicipalityId
LEFT JOIN Users AS U ON U.ID=MF.UserId
LEFT OUTER JOIN Vendor AS V ON V.ID=MF.CXVendorId
LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY GF.RelatedFormGUID ORDER BY GF.AddedTime) AS rn,
				GF.RelatedFormGuid as formGuid,GR.Lot,SD.Subdivision,GR.FullAddress
				FROM GIS2Forms GF, GisRecords GR, Subdivisions SD
				WHERE GR.ID=GF.GISRecordId AND SD.ID=GR.SubdivisionId
) AS GR ON GR.FormGuid=MF.FormGUID AND GR.rn=1
where   FT.CodeEnforcement=:codeEnforcement 
     and (MF.FormGUID IN (select RelatedFormGUID from GIS2Forms where GISRecordId=:GISRecordId ))) wmTempTable

and (:municipalityInternalForm IS NULL OR

GetProcessGroupMemebersByFormGUID.name: GetProcessGroupMemebersByFormGUID
GetProcessGroupMemebersByFormGUID.queryString:
select CASE count(*) WHEN 0 THEN 0 ELSE 1 END AS IsProcessOwner from MasterForms MF, FormStatuses FS, MunicipalityGroups MG
    WHERE MF.FormGUID=:FormGUID
    and FS.ID=MF.formStatusId
	and MG.ID=FS.processOwners
	and :UserId IN (SELECT GM.userId FROM MunicipalityGroupMembers GM WHERE GM.municipalityGroupId=MG.id)
GetProcessGroupMemebersByFormGUID.countQueryString:
select count(*) from (select CASE count(*) WHEN 0 THEN 0 ELSE 1 END AS IsProcessOwner from MasterForms MF, FormStatuses FS, MunicipalityGroups MG
    WHERE MF.FormGUID=:FormGUID
    and FS.ID=MF.formStatusId
	and MG.ID=FS.processOwners
	and :UserId IN (SELECT GM.userId FROM MunicipalityGroupMembers GM WHERE GM.municipalityGroupId=MG.id)) wmTempTable

MunicipalityForms.name: MunicipalityForms
MunicipalityForms.queryString:
SELECT MF.FormGuid as formGuid,
MF.FormTitle as formTitle,
U.FullName as createdBy,
MF.DateSubmitted as dateSubmitted,
MU.MunicipalityName as municipalityName,

FT.FormType as formDesign,
FS.Status as formStatus,
GR.Lot as lot,GR.Subdivision as subdivision,
GR.FullAddress as address,
V.CompanyName as primaryVendor,
MF.BalanceDue as balanceDue,
FT.ID as formTypeID,
FT.CodeEnforcement as codeEnforcement,
FT.MunicipalityInternalForm as municipalityInternalForm,
FC.ID as FormCategory,
MF.DateModified as dateModified
FROM MasterForms MF
LEFT OUTER JOIN FormStatuses AS FS ON FS.ID=MF.FormStatusId
LEFT OUTER JOIN FormTypes AS FT ON FT.ID=MF.FormTypeId
LEFT JOIN FormCategoryMapping AS FCM ON FT.ID = FCM.FormTypeId
LEFT JOIN FormCategories AS FC ON FCM.FormCategoryId=FC.ID
LEFT OUTER JOIN Municipalities AS MU ON MU.ID=FT.MunicipalityId
LEFT JOIN Users AS U ON U.ID=MF.UserId
LEFT OUTER JOIN Vendor AS V ON V.ID=MF.CXVendorId
LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY GF.RelatedFormGUID ORDER BY GF.AddedTime) AS rn,
				GF.RelatedFormGuid as formGuid,GR.Lot,SD.Subdivision,GR.FullAddress FROM GIS2Forms GF, GisRecords GR, Subdivisions SD
				WHERE GR.ID=GF.GISRecordId AND SD.ID=GR.SubdivisionId
) AS GR ON GR.FormGuid=MF.FormGUID AND GR.rn=1 
where  
   (:municipalityId IS NULL OR FT.MunicipalityId=:municipalityId) 
	and(:municipalityInternalForm IS NULL OR FT.MunicipalityInternalForm=:municipalityInternalForm)
	and (:Closed IS NULL OR  Closed=:Closed)
	AND DateSubmitted BETWEEN :startd and :endd
MunicipalityForms.countQueryString:
select count(*) from (SELECT MF.FormGuid as formGuid,
MF.FormTitle as formTitle,
U.FullName as createdBy,
MF.DateSubmitted as dateSubmitted,
MU.MunicipalityName as municipalityName,

FT.FormType as formDesign,
FS.Status as formStatus,
GR.Lot as lot,GR.Subdivision as subdivision,
GR.FullAddress as address,
V.CompanyName as primaryVendor,
MF.BalanceDue as balanceDue,
FT.ID as formTypeID,
FT.CodeEnforcement as codeEnforcement,
FT.MunicipalityInternalForm as municipalityInternalForm,
FC.ID as FormCategory,
MF.DateModified as dateModified
FROM MasterForms MF
LEFT OUTER JOIN FormStatuses AS FS ON FS.ID=MF.FormStatusId
LEFT OUTER JOIN FormTypes AS FT ON FT.ID=MF.FormTypeId
LEFT JOIN FormCategoryMapping AS FCM ON FT.ID = FCM.FormTypeId
LEFT JOIN FormCategories AS FC ON FCM.FormCategoryId=FC.ID
LEFT OUTER JOIN Municipalities AS MU ON MU.ID=FT.MunicipalityId
LEFT JOIN Users AS U ON U.ID=MF.UserId
LEFT OUTER JOIN Vendor AS V ON V.ID=MF.CXVendorId
LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY GF.RelatedFormGUID ORDER BY GF.AddedTime) AS rn,
				GF.RelatedFormGuid as formGuid,GR.Lot,SD.Subdivision,GR.FullAddress FROM GIS2Forms GF, GisRecords GR, Subdivisions SD
				WHERE GR.ID=GF.GISRecordId AND SD.ID=GR.SubdivisionId
) AS GR ON GR.FormGuid=MF.FormGUID AND GR.rn=1 
where  
   (:municipalityId IS NULL OR FT.MunicipalityId=:municipalityId) 
	and(:municipalityInternalForm IS NULL OR FT.MunicipalityInternalForm=:municipalityInternalForm)
	and (:Closed IS NULL OR  Closed=:Closed)
	AND DateSubmitted BETWEEN :startd and :endd) wmTempTable

ProcessFormsForUserByMunicipality.name: ProcessFormsForUserByMunicipality
ProcessFormsForUserByMunicipality.description: Get forms from Master Forms where employee is in group of that in current form Status
ProcessFormsForUserByMunicipality.queryString:
SELECT MF.FormGuid as formGuid,
	MF.FormTitle as formTitle,
	MF.DateSubmitted as dateSubmitted,
	MF.DateModified as dateModified,
	MU.MunicipalityName as municipalityName,
	U.FullName as createdBy,
	FT.FormType as formDesign,
	FS.Status as formStatus,
	GR.Lot as lot,
	GR.Subdivision as subdivision,
	GR.FullAddress as address,
	V.CompanyName as primaryVendor,
	MF.BalanceDue as balanceDue,
	FT.CodeEnforcement as codeEnforcement
FROM MasterForms MF
LEFT OUTER JOIN FormStatuses AS FS ON FS.ID=MF.FormStatusId
LEFT OUTER JOIN FormTypes AS FT ON FT.ID=MF.FormTypeId
LEFT OUTER JOIN Municipalities AS MU ON MU.ID=FT.MunicipalityId
LEFT JOIN Users AS U ON U.ID=MF.UserId
LEFT JOIN MunicipalityGroups AS MG ON MG.id=FS.processOwners
LEFT OUTER JOIN Vendor AS V ON V.ID=MF.CXVendorId
LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY GF.RelatedFormGUID ORDER BY GF.AddedTime) AS rn,
				GF.RelatedFormGuid as formGuid,
				GR.Lot,
				SD.Subdivision,
				GR.FullAddress
				FROM GIS2Forms GF, GisRecords GR, Subdivisions SD
				WHERE GR.ID=GF.GISRecordId AND SD.ID=GR.SubdivisionId
) AS GR ON GR.FormGuid=MF.FormGUID AND GR.rn=1
where
    Closed=:closed
    AND FT.MunicipalityId=:MunicipalityId
	AND :UserId IN (SELECT GM.userId FROM MunicipalityGroupMembers GM WHERE GM.municipalityGroupId=MG.id)

	GR.FullAddress as address,
	V.CompanyName as primaryVendor,

	FT.CodeEnforcement as codeEnforcement
FROM MasterForms MF
LEFT OUTER JOIN FormStatuses AS FS ON FS.ID=MF.FormStatusId
LEFT OUTER JOIN FormTypes AS FT ON FT.ID=MF.FormTypeId
LEFT OUTER JOIN Municipalities AS MU ON MU.ID=FT.MunicipalityId
LEFT JOIN Users AS U ON U.ID=MF.UserId
LEFT JOIN MunicipalityGroups AS MG ON MG.id=FS.processOwners
LEFT OUTER JOIN Vendor AS V ON V.ID=MF.CXVendorId
LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY GF.RelatedFormGUID ORDER BY GF.AddedTime) AS rn,
				GF.RelatedFormGuid as formGuid,
				GR.Lot,
				SD.Subdivision,
				GR.FullAddress
				FROM GIS2Forms GF, GisRecords GR, Subdivisions SD
				WHERE GR.ID=GF.GISRecordId AND SD.ID=GR.SubdivisionId
) AS GR ON GR.FormGuid=MF.FormGUID AND GR.rn=1
where
    Closed=:closed
    AND FT.MunicipalityId=:MunicipalityId
	AND :UserId IN (SELECT GM.userId FROM MunicipalityGroupMembers GM WHERE GM.municipalityGroupId=MG.id)) wmTempTable

SearchAllFormsByAddress.name: SearchAllFormsByAddress
SearchAllFormsByAddress.queryString:
SELECT MF.FormGuid as formGuid,MF.FormTitle as formTitle,MU.MunicipalityName as municipalityName,U.FullName as createdBy,FT.FormType as formDesign,FS.Status as formStatus,
	GR.Lot as lot,GR.Subdivision as subdivision,GR.FullAddress as address,V.CompanyName as primaryVendor,MF.BalanceDue as balanceDue
	,FT.ID as formTypeID,FC.ID as FormCategory,
	MF.DateModified as dateModified
FROM MasterForms MF
LEFT OUTER JOIN FormStatuses AS FS ON FS.ID=MF.FormStatusId
LEFT OUTER JOIN FormTypes AS FT ON FT.ID=MF.FormTypeId

LEFT JOIN FormCategoryMapping AS FCM ON FT.ID = FCM.FormTypeId

LEFT JOIN FormCategories AS FC ON FCM.FormCategoryId=FC.ID

LEFT OUTER JOIN Municipalities AS MU ON MU.ID=FT.MunicipalityId
LEFT JOIN Users AS U ON U.ID=MF.UserId
LEFT OUTER JOIN Vendor AS V ON V.ID=MF.CXVendorId
LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY GF.RelatedFormGUID ORDER BY GF.AddedTime) AS rn,
				GF.RelatedFormGuid as formGuid,GR.Lot,SD.Subdivision,GR.FullAddress
				FROM GIS2Forms GF, GisRecords GR, Subdivisions SD
				WHERE GR.ID=GF.GISRecordId AND SD.ID=GR.SubdivisionId
) AS GR ON GR.FormGuid=MF.FormGUID AND GR.rn=1

where   FT.CodeEnforcement=:codeEnforcement 
     and (MF.FormGUID IN (select RelatedFormGUID from GIS2Forms where GISRecordId=:GISRecordId ))
    AND (:municipalityId IS NULL OR FT.MunicipalityId=:municipalityId) AND (:formcategoryID is null OR FC.ID=:formcategoryID)

	and (:Closed IS NULL OR  Closed=:Closed)
	and(:municipalityInternalForm IS NULL OR FT.MunicipalityInternalForm=:municipalityInternalForm)
	and (:publicRead IS NULL OR FS.PublicRead=:publicRead)
	AND DateSubmitted BETWEEN :startd and :endd

UserMessagesCountByMunicipality.name: UserMessagesCountByMunicipality
UserMessagesCountByMunicipality.queryString:
select sum(messagesCount) messagesCount
from (

select count(FMT.ID) as messagesCount
from
FormMessageTagging FMT
INNER JOIN FormMessages M ON M.ID=FMT.FormMessageId
INNER JOIN Users U ON U.ID=M.UserId
INNER JOIN Projects PR ON PR.ProjectGUID=M.RelatedProjectGUID
INNER JOIN Municipalities MUNI ON MUNI.ID=PR.MunicipalityId
where FMT.TaggedPersonId=:taggedPersonId  and (:municipalityId IS NULL OR  MUNI.ID=:municipalityId)  and (:messageStatus IS NULL OR FMT.MessageRead=:messageStatus)
UNION

select count(FMT.ID) as messagesCount
from
FormMessageTagging FMT
INNER JOIN FormMessages M ON M.ID=FMT.FormMessageId
INNER JOIN Users U ON U.ID=M.UserId
INNER JOIN MasterForms MF ON MF.FormGUID=M.RelatedFormGUID
INNER JOIN FormTypes FT ON FT.ID=MF.FormTypeId
INNER JOIN Municipalities MUNI ON MUNI.ID=MF.MunicipalityId
where FMT.TaggedPersonId=:taggedPersonId  and(:municipalityId IS NULL OR  MUNI.ID=:municipalityId)  and (:messageStatus IS NULL OR FMT.MessageRead=:messageStatus)

UNION 

select count(FMT.ID) as messagesCount
from
FormMessageTagging FMT
INNER JOIN FormMessages M ON M.ID=FMT.FormMessageId
INNER JOIN Users U ON U.ID=M.UserId
INNER JOIN MasterInspections MI ON MI.InspectionGuid=M.RelatedInspectionGUID
INNER JOIN InspectionDesign INSP ON INSP.ID=MI.InspectionDesignId
INNER JOIN Municipalities MUNI ON MUNI.ID=INSP.MunicipalityId
where FMT.TaggedPersonId=:taggedPersonId and(:municipalityId IS NULL OR  MUNI.ID=:municipalityId)  and (:messageStatus IS NULL OR FMT.MessageRead=:messageStatus)

) s

assignedInspectionsBetweenDates.name: assignedInspectionsBetweenDates
assignedInspectionsBetweenDates.queryString:
select MI.inspectionGuid as inspectionGuid,
MI.assignedTo as assignedTo,
MI.DateAssigned as dateAssigned,
assignedUser.fullName as assignedToPersonName,
IO.outcome as outcome,
MI.inspectionTitle as inspectionTitle,
gis.inspectionZone as inspectionZone,
MI.requestedFor as requestedFor,
gis.fullAddress as fullAddress,
gis.lot as lot,
gis.subdivision as subdivision,
requestedBy.fullName as requestedByFullName,
ID.inspectDesignName as inspectDesignName
from MasterInspections as MI
LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY GF.RelatedFormGUID ORDER BY GF.AddedTime) AS rn,
				GF.RelatedFormGuid as formGuid,
				GR.Lot,
				SD.Subdivision,
				GR.InspectionZone,
				GR.FullAddress
				FROM GIS2Forms GF, GisRecords GR, Subdivisions SD
				WHERE GR.ID=GF.GISRecordId AND SD.ID=GR.SubdivisionId
) AS gis ON gis.FormGuid=MI.FormGUID AND gis.rn=1
LEFT OUTER JOIN Users assignedUser on assignedUser.id=MI.assignedTo
LEFT OUTER JOIN Users requestedBy on requestedBy.id=MI.requestedBy
LEFT OUTER JOIN InspectionDesign ID on ID.ID=MI.InspectionDesignId
LEFT OUTER JOIN InspectionOutcome IO ON IO.ID=MI.InspectionOutcomeId
where MI.closed=:isClosed and (:municipality IS NULL OR ID.municipalityId=:municipality) and (:assignedTo IS NULL OR assignedTo=:assignedTo) and (:startDate is null or MI.DateAssigned >= :startDate) and (:endDate is null or MI.DateAssigned <= :endDate)
assignedInspectionsBetweenDates.countQueryString:
select count(*) from (select MI.inspectionGuid as inspectionGuid,
MI.assignedTo as assignedTo,
MI.DateAssigned as dateAssigned,
assignedUser.fullName as assignedToPersonName,
IO.outcome as outcome,
MI.inspectionTitle as inspectionTitle,
gis.inspectionZone as inspectionZone,
MI.requestedFor as requestedFor,
gis.fullAddress as fullAddress,
gis.lot as lot,
gis.subdivision as subdivision,
requestedBy.fullName as requestedByFullName,
ID.inspectDesignName as inspectDesignName
from MasterInspections as MI
LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY GF.RelatedFormGUID ORDER BY GF.AddedTime) AS rn,
				GF.RelatedFormGuid as formGuid,
				GR.Lot,
				SD.Subdivision,
				GR.InspectionZone,
				GR.FullAddress
				FROM GIS2Forms GF, GisRecords GR, Subdivisions SD
				WHERE GR.ID=GF.GISRecordId AND SD.ID=GR.SubdivisionId
) AS gis ON gis.FormGuid=MI.FormGUID AND gis.rn=1
LEFT OUTER JOIN Users assignedUser on assignedUser.id=MI.assignedTo
LEFT OUTER JOIN Users requestedBy on requestedBy.id=MI.requestedBy
LEFT OUTER JOIN InspectionDesign ID on ID.ID=MI.InspectionDesignId
LEFT OUTER JOIN InspectionOutcome IO ON IO.ID=MI.InspectionOutcomeId
where MI.closed=:isClosed and (:municipality IS NULL OR ID.municipalityId=:municipality) and (:assignedTo IS NULL OR assignedTo=:assignedTo) and (:startDate is null or MI.DateAssigned >= :startDate) and (:endDate is null or MI.DateAssigned <= :endDate)) wmTempTable

getFeesForTransaction.name: getFeesForTransaction
getFeesForTransaction.queryString:
select F.Amount,
F.FeeType,
F.AccountingCode,
MF.FormTitle,
FT.FormType as FormDesign,
MUNI.MunicipalityName,
GR.FullAddress,
F.Comments
FROM Fees F
INNER JOIN MasterForms MF ON MF.FormGUID=F.FormGuid
INNER JOIN FormTypes FT ON MF.FormTypeId=FT.ID
INNER JOIN Municipalities MUNI ON MUNI.ID=MF.MunicipalityId
LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY GF.RelatedFormGUID ORDER BY GF.AddedTime) AS rn,
				GF.RelatedFormGuid as formGuid,GR.Lot,SD.Subdivision,GR.FullAddress
				FROM GIS2Forms GF, GisRecords GR, Subdivisions SD
				WHERE GR.ID=GF.GISRecordId AND SD.ID=GR.SubdivisionId
) AS GR ON GR.FormGuid=MF.FormGUID AND GR.rn=1
WHERE F.TransactionId=:transactionId
getFeesForTransaction.countQueryString:
select count(*) from (select F.Amount,
F.FeeType,
F.AccountingCode,
MF.FormTitle,
FT.FormType as FormDesign,
MUNI.MunicipalityName,
GR.FullAddress,
F.Comments
FROM Fees F
INNER JOIN MasterForms MF ON MF.FormGUID=F.FormGuid
INNER JOIN FormTypes FT ON MF.FormTypeId=FT.ID
INNER JOIN Municipalities MUNI ON MUNI.ID=MF.MunicipalityId
LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY GF.RelatedFormGUID ORDER BY GF.AddedTime) AS rn,
				GF.RelatedFormGuid as formGuid,GR.Lot,SD.Subdivision,GR.FullAddress
				FROM GIS2Forms GF, GisRecords GR, Subdivisions SD
				WHERE GR.ID=GF.GISRecordId AND SD.ID=GR.SubdivisionId
) AS GR ON GR.FormGuid=MF.FormGUID AND GR.rn=1
WHERE F.TransactionId=:transactionId) wmTempTable

getFormCountForGisRecord.name: getFormCountForGisRecord
getFormCountForGisRecord.queryString:
select ISNULL(count(MF.FormGuid), 0) as formCount,
(CASE WHEN FS.ConsiderClosed=1 THEN 'Closed' ELSE 'Open' END) as ConsiderClosed
from Gis2Forms GTF
INNER JOIN MasterForms MF ON MF.FormGUID=GTF.RelatedFormGuid
INNER JOIN FormTypes FT ON FT.ID=MF.FormTypeId AND FT.CodeEnforcement=:isCase
INNER JOIN FormStatuses FS ON FS.ID=MF.FormStatusId
WHERE GTF.GISRecordId=:gisRecordId
GROUP BY FS.ConsiderClosed
getFormCountForGisRecord.countQueryString:
select count(*) from (select ISNULL(count(MF.FormGuid), 0) as formCount,
(CASE WHEN FS.ConsiderClosed=1 THEN 'Closed' ELSE 'Open' END) as ConsiderClosed
from Gis2Forms GTF
INNER JOIN MasterForms MF ON MF.FormGUID=GTF.RelatedFormGuid
INNER JOIN FormTypes FT ON FT.ID=MF.FormTypeId AND FT.CodeEnforcement=:isCase
INNER JOIN FormStatuses FS ON FS.ID=MF.FormStatusId
WHERE GTF.GISRecordId=:gisRecordId
GROUP BY FS.ConsiderClosed) wmTempTable

getInspectionsByOutcome.name: getInspectionsByOutcome
getInspectionsByOutcome.queryString:
select 
I.inspectionGuid as inspectionGuid,
U.FullName as assignedTo,
IO.outcome as outcome,
I.inspectionTitle as inspectionTitle,
I.requestedFor as requestedFor,
I.DateAssigned as dateAssigned,
ID.inspectDesignName as inspectDesignName,
gis.inspectionZone as inspectionZone,
gis.fullAddress as fullAddress,
gis.lot as lot,
gis.subdivision as subdivision
from MasterInspections I
LEFT OUTER JOIN Users U ON U.ID=I.AssignedTo
LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY GF.RelatedFormGUID ORDER BY GF.AddedTime) AS rn,
				GF.RelatedFormGuid as formGuid,
				GR.Lot,
				GR.InspectionZone,
				SD.Subdivision,
				GR.FullAddress
				FROM GIS2Forms GF, GisRecords GR, Subdivisions SD
				WHERE GR.ID=GF.GISRecordId AND SD.ID=GR.SubdivisionId
) AS gis ON gis.FormGuid=I.FormGUID AND gis.rn=1
JOIN InspectionDesign ID ON ID.ID=I.InspectionDesignId
JOIN InspectionOutcome IO ON I.InspectionOutcomeId=IO.ID
where IO.outcome=:outcome and (:municipality IS NULL OR ID.MunicipalityId=:municipality)
Order By requestedFor, dateAssigned ASC

getTotalPaymentByMethodForPeriod.name: getTotalPaymentByMethodForPeriod
getTotalPaymentByMethodForPeriod.queryString:
select PH.PaymentMethod,
SUM(F.Amount) as paymentAmount
from PaymentHistory PH
INNER JOIN Fees F ON F.TransactionId=PH.TransactionId
where (:municipalityId IS NULL OR :municipalityId IN (SELECT F.MunicipalityId FROM Fees F WHERE F.TransactionId=PH.TransactionId))
    AND PH.DateCreated between :startd and :endd
    GROUP BY PH.PaymentMethod
    ORDER BY paymentAmount desc

resetPasswordForUser.name: resetPasswordForUser
resetPasswordForUser.description: Resets password for a user, given user ID as Integer and password as String.
resetPasswordForUser.queryString: UPDATE Users SET Password=:newPassword where ID in (select UserId from UserPasswordResetTokens where ExpirationDate >= GETDATE() and Token = :token)

resetPasswordWithTokenForUser.name: resetPasswordWithTokenForUser
resetPasswordWithTokenForUser.description: This saves a reset password token in the DB given a User ID and Token.
resetPasswordWithTokenForUser.queryString:
DELETE FROM UserPasswordResetTokens WHERE UserId = :userid 
INSERT INTO UserPasswordResetTokens (UserId, Token, ExpirationDate) VALUES ( :userid, :token, DATEADD(day, 2, GETDATE()))

searchGisByFullAddress.name: searchGisByFullAddress
searchGisByFullAddress.queryString:
Select GIS.ID,
    sub.Subdivision as subdivisionName,
    GIS.Parcel,
    GIS.Lot,
    GIS.Section,
    GIS.StreetNumber,
    GIS.StreetName,
    GIS.UnitNumber,
    GIS.City,
    state.StateName,
    GIS.InspectionZone,
    GIS.FullAddress
FROM GISRecords GIS
LEFT OUTER JOIN Subdivisions sub ON sub.ID=GIS.SubdivisionId
LEFT OUTER JOIN States state ON state.ID=GIS.StateId
WHERE GIS.MunicipalityId=:municipalityId
and (
        (:fullAddress is not null and lower(concat('%',GIS.FullAddress,'%')) LIKE LOWER(CONCAT('%',:fullAddress,'%')))
        or (:parcel is not null AND concat('%',GIS.Parcel,'%') LIKE concat('%',:parcel,'%'))
)
searchGisByFullAddress.countQueryString:
select count(*) from (Select GIS.ID,
    sub.Subdivision as subdivisionName,
    GIS.Parcel,
    GIS.Lot,
    GIS.Section,
    GIS.StreetNumber,
    GIS.StreetName,
    GIS.UnitNumber,
    GIS.City,
    state.StateName,
    GIS.InspectionZone,
    GIS.FullAddress
FROM GISRecords GIS
LEFT OUTER JOIN Subdivisions sub ON sub.ID=GIS.SubdivisionId
LEFT OUTER JOIN States state ON state.ID=GIS.StateId
WHERE GIS.MunicipalityId=:municipalityId
and (
        (:fullAddress is not null and lower(concat('%',GIS.FullAddress,'%')) LIKE LOWER(CONCAT('%',:fullAddress,'%')))
        or (:parcel is not null AND concat('%',GIS.Parcel,'%') LIKE concat('%',:parcel,'%'))
)) wmTempTable

searchUsersByEmailOrName.name: searchUsersByEmailOrName
searchUsersByEmailOrName.description: Searches users by email or full name
searchUsersByEmailOrName.queryString: SELECT ID, FullName, Photo, Email FROM Users WHERE Active=1 AND (Email LIKE CONCAT('%',:searchString,'%') OR FullName LIKE CONCAT('%',:searchString,'%'))
searchUsersByEmailOrName.countQueryString: select count(*) from (SELECT ID, FullName, Photo, Email FROM Users WHERE Active=1 AND (Email LIKE CONCAT('%',:searchString,'%') OR FullName LIKE CONCAT('%',:searchString,'%'))) wmTempTable

searchWithFormTitle.name: searchWithFormTitle
searchWithFormTitle.queryString:
SELECT MF.FormGuid as formGuid,MF.FormTitle as formTitle,MU.MunicipalityName as municipalityName,U.FullName as createdBy,FT.FormType as formDesign,FS.Status as formStatus,
	GR.Lot as lot,GR.Subdivision as subdivision,GR.FullAddress as address,V.CompanyName as primaryVendor,MF.BalanceDue as balanceDue
	,FT.ID as formTypeID,FC.ID as FormCategory,MF.DateModified as dateModified
FROM MasterForms MF
LEFT OUTER JOIN FormStatuses AS FS ON FS.ID=MF.FormStatusId
LEFT OUTER JOIN FormTypes AS FT ON FT.ID=MF.FormTypeId

LEFT JOIN FormCategoryMapping AS FCM ON FT.ID = FCM.FormTypeId

LEFT JOIN FormCategories AS FC ON FCM.FormCategoryId=FC.ID

LEFT OUTER JOIN Municipalities AS MU ON MU.ID=FT.MunicipalityId
LEFT JOIN Users AS U ON U.ID=MF.UserId
LEFT OUTER JOIN Vendor AS V ON V.ID=MF.CXVendorId
LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY GF.RelatedFormGUID ORDER BY GF.AddedTime) AS rn,
				GF.RelatedFormGuid as formGuid,GR.Lot,SD.Subdivision,GR.FullAddress
				FROM GIS2Forms GF, GisRecords GR, Subdivisions SD
				WHERE GR.ID=GF.GISRecordId AND SD.ID=GR.SubdivisionId
) AS GR ON GR.FormGuid=MF.FormGUID AND GR.rn=1

where   (:municipalityId IS NULL OR FT.MunicipalityId=:municipalityId)
      and (:publicRead IS NULL OR FS.PublicRead=:publicRead)
      and(:municipalityInternalForm IS NULL OR FT.MunicipalityInternalForm=:municipalityInternalForm)
 and MF.FormTitle like :formTitle
searchWithFormTitle.countQueryString:
select count(*) from (SELECT MF.FormGuid as formGuid,MF.FormTitle as formTitle,MU.MunicipalityName as municipalityName,U.FullName as createdBy,FT.FormType as formDesign,FS.Status as formStatus,
	GR.Lot as lot,GR.Subdivision as subdivision,GR.FullAddress as address,V.CompanyName as primaryVendor,MF.BalanceDue as balanceDue
	,FT.ID as formTypeID,FC.ID as FormCategory,MF.DateModified as dateModified
FROM MasterForms MF
LEFT OUTER JOIN FormStatuses AS FS ON FS.ID=MF.FormStatusId
LEFT OUTER JOIN FormTypes AS FT ON FT.ID=MF.FormTypeId

LEFT JOIN FormCategoryMapping AS FCM ON FT.ID = FCM.FormTypeId

LEFT JOIN FormCategories AS FC ON FCM.FormCategoryId=FC.ID

LEFT OUTER JOIN Municipalities AS MU ON MU.ID=FT.MunicipalityId
LEFT JOIN Users AS U ON U.ID=MF.UserId
LEFT OUTER JOIN Vendor AS V ON V.ID=MF.CXVendorId
LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY GF.RelatedFormGUID ORDER BY GF.AddedTime) AS rn,
				GF.RelatedFormGuid as formGuid,GR.Lot,SD.Subdivision,GR.FullAddress
				FROM GIS2Forms GF, GisRecords GR, Subdivisions SD
				WHERE GR.ID=GF.GISRecordId AND SD.ID=GR.SubdivisionId
) AS GR ON GR.FormGuid=MF.FormGUID AND GR.rn=1

where   (:municipalityId IS NULL OR FT.MunicipalityId=:municipalityId)
      and (:publicRead IS NULL OR FS.PublicRead=:publicRead)
      and(:municipalityInternalForm IS NULL OR FT.MunicipalityInternalForm=:municipalityInternalForm)
 and MF.FormTitle like :formTitle) wmTempTable

selectGisRecordsOfForm.name: selectGisRecordsOfForm
selectGisRecordsOfForm.queryString: select gisrecordId as gisrecordId,gisrecords.lot as lot,gisrecords.fullAddress as fullAddress  from Gis2forms where relatedFormGuid=:relatedFormGuid
selectGisRecordsOfForm.countQueryString: select count(*)  from Gis2forms where relatedFormGuid=:relatedFormGuid

setMessageReadStatus.name: setMessageReadStatus
setMessageReadStatus.queryString: update FormMessageTagging set MessageRead=:messageRead where ID=:id

sumOfFeesInUsersCart.name: sumOfFeesInUsersCart
sumOfFeesInUsersCart.queryString: select sum(fees.amount) as sumOfFeesInCart from MyCart where userId=:user and fees.paidStatus='Unpaid'
sumOfFeesInUsersCart.countQueryString: select count(*)  from MyCart where userId=:user and fees.paidStatus='Unpaid'

timeFormEnteredStatus.name: timeFormEnteredStatus
timeFormEnteredStatus.description: Time the form most recently when from some status to the form's current status
timeFormEnteredStatus.queryString:
select CreatedTime from FormHistory
where ID=(select top 1 ID FROM FormHistory
    where NewStatusId!=OldStatusId
    and NewStatusId=(select FormStatusId FROM MasterForms where FormGUID=:formGuid)
    and FormGUID=:formGuid
    ORDER BY CreatedTime DESC)
timeFormEnteredStatus.countQueryString:
select count(*) from (select CreatedTime from FormHistory
where ID=(select top 1 ID FROM FormHistory
    where NewStatusId!=OldStatusId
    and NewStatusId=(select FormStatusId FROM MasterForms where FormGUID=:formGuid)
    and FormGUID=:formGuid
    ORDER BY CreatedTime DESC)) wmTempTable

updateAssessFeeYN.name: updateAssessFeeYN
updateAssessFeeYN.queryString: update InspectionOutcome set AssessFeeYN=:AssessFeeYN where ID=:id

updateMunicipalityLogo.name: updateMunicipalityLogo
updateMunicipalityLogo.queryString: update Municipalities set logo=:logoBytes where ID=:municipalityId

updateTrackViolations.name: updateTrackViolations
updateTrackViolations.queryString: update FormTypes set TrackViolations=:TrackViolations where ID=:formType

userSubscriptionsCount.name: userSubscriptionsCount
userSubscriptionsCount.queryString: select count(*) as userSubscriptionsCount from UserSubscriptions
userSubscriptionsCount.countQueryString: select count(*) from (select count(*) as userSubscriptionsCount from UserSubscriptions) wmTempTable

userSubscriptionsCountForMunicipality.name: userSubscriptionsCountForMunicipality
userSubscriptionsCountForMunicipality.queryString: select count(*) as userSubscriptionsCountForMunicipality from UserSubscriptions where MunicipalityId=:municipalityId
userSubscriptionsCountForMunicipality.countQueryString: select count(*) from (select count(*) as userSubscriptionsCountForMunicipality from UserSubscriptions where MunicipalityId=:municipalityId) wmTempTable

verifyPasswordResetToken.name: verifyPasswordResetToken
verifyPasswordResetToken.description: Given a token, Validates token based on expiration date. Null returned if no tokens match or expiration date is past.
verifyPasswordResetToken.queryString: select * from UserPasswordResetTokens WHERE( ExpirationDate >= GETDATE() AND Token = :token)
verifyPasswordResetToken.countQueryString: select count(*) from (select * from UserPasswordResetTokens WHERE( ExpirationDate >= GETDATE() AND Token = :token)) wmTempTable
